title: Boku OC Mobile RP Purchase
body: I'm just a little curious as to what happened to Boku, I would usually used my mobile service to get RP, have done so for the past two years now, and all of a sudden it doesn't support Telstra anymore? ... What?{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

While I don't use Boku myself, I just checked and it seems Telstra is still a selectable network carrier (See image below)

http://puu.sh/oRmqD/8b6f0d8f81.png

Well, It just made a liar of me, thank you for your time. LOL
I guess it was just temporarily unavailable

Good to hear that all is well now.

See you on the rift,
Seph
I can get to that point, then I will type my phone number in, then a small red message above the phone number box that reads "Telstra not supported"
So for the past 5 days, the mobile purchases don't seem to work. I get the message that says to reply with 'Y' but when I send 'Y' there is no further response. Any pointers??

I find when it does that for me, it's usually a lag issue with League.
Try just restarting your client and trying again if that happen.
